trans-unit.source: Defines the default rank of an array.

For a host application that is based on COM, add the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.SafeArrayDefaultRankAttribute> attribute in the proxy code to marshaled safe array parameters or return values to specify the actual rank of the arrays in question.
trans-unit.target: 对于基于 COM 主机应用程序，添加<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.SafeArrayDefaultRankAttribute>属性中的代理代码以便封送的安全数组参数或返回值，以指定数组的秩实际问题。

trans-unit.source: This is needed because there is no differentiation between one-dimensional and multi-dimensional arrays in the COM type library.
trans-unit.target: 这被必须的因为 COM 类型库中的一维数组与多维阵列之间没有差异。

trans-unit.source: The COM safe arrays are converted to one-dimensional arrays in the proxy code by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，COM 安全数组转换为在代理代码中的一维数组。

trans-unit.source: Also, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.SafeArrayDefaultRankAttribute> attribute with parameters or return values of type <xref:System.Array> or `System.Object[]` that do not convey rank information.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.SafeArrayDefaultRankAttribute>特性与参数或返回类型的值<xref:System.Array>或`System.Object[]`，不提供排名的信息。

trans-unit.source: The default rank of the array.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.SafeArrayDefaultRankAttribute" /> class with a default rank.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认排名初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.SafeArrayDefaultRankAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default rank of the array.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the default rank of the array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />表示数组的默认排名的值。
